title: Session Fees
description: Talkfit Counselling Services offer both time-limited and ongoing sessions.
allergies: There are two well-behaved dogs on the premises. Please let us know if this may be a problem for you.

prices.description:
Please note that once a session is booked that this time is exclusively for you.

It cannot be shared with anyone else or re-used at short notice. It is for this reason that we ask for 48 hours notice for any cancellation or re-scheduling of sessions .

Should you not be able to come to an appointment for any reason please let me know at least 48 hours before the session is due.

Unattended sessions will be charged at the full rate.
Should you require information to be forwarded to another professional body, your consent will be needed in writing and an admin charge will be payable.

These sessions are booked via Sportfit Support Services Ltd.

Sessions can be booked in blocks or ad-hoc depending on the young person's requirements.

Weekly therapy can take place in our TalkFit therapy room or at a location of the young person's choosing, placing importance on how the young person would like to communicate.

The use of tailored, therapeutic environments encourage connection and a feeling of safety. Mediums currently in use are: music, forest walks or even visiting and caring for horses.
For assurance companies looking for a person centred counsellor offering motivational enhancement therapy.
